structured-macro.plain-text-body:
Community: * The ActiveMQ project has had another very busy but quiet quarter. * The development and user lists continue to stay vibrant.
Development: * It was a busy an fruitful quarter which produced several new releases.
Releases: * Apache.NMS 1.1.0 * Apache.NMS.ActiveMQ 1.1.0 * Apache.NMS.EMS 1.1.0 * Apache.NMS.MSMQ 1.1.0 * Apache.NMS.WCF 1.1.0 * ActiveIO 3.1.1 * ActiveIO 3.1.2 * ActiveMQ Protocol Buffers 1.0 * ActiveMQ 5.3.0
